analysisMethod: Manual reasoning due to sequential-thinking tool unavailable (记录在 operations-log.md)

questions.question: 用户所说的 run 是运行 blog-frontend、admin-frontend 还是后端模块？期望输出或验证标准是什么？
What REST API endpoints (URL, payload shape) will the backend expose for blog posts, categories, tags, and comments?
How should the Vue project be migrated to TypeScript (tsconfig setup, component script lang, Vite config updates)?
What content structure and layout sections are required to emulate the Butterfly theme while respecting Liquid Glass guidelines?
Which backend modules should host the blog APIs (BirdBlog-blog vs BirdBlog-admin) and how will cross-origin requests be handled?
Are there existing shared components or utility styles within admin-frontend that should be reused?
